project.description: cherry pick commits from kendo-ui-core/production to kendo/production

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
export ORIGIN=git@github.com:telerik/kendo.git
if [ $(git remote | wc -l) -ne 2 ]; then echo "Adding remote origin" git remote add origin $ORIGIN INITIAL=true fi
git fetch origin +refs/heads/production:private-production &>/dev/null
if [ -z "$INITIAL" ]; then PREVIOUS=$(git rev-parse previous)
if [ "$PREVIOUS" == $(git rev-parse core/production) ]; then echo "nothing to pick" exit 0 fi else echo "Initial fetch, skipping cherry-pick" git tag -f previous core/production exit 0 fi
git checkout private-production &>/dev/null
for commit in `git rev-list --reverse --topo-order previous..core/production`; do if [ `git cat-file -p $commit | grep ^parent | wc -l` -eq 1 ]; then git cherry-pick $commit || echo "WARNING: Could not cherry pick $commit";
CHERRY_PICK_RESULT=$?
if [ $CHERRY_PICK_RESULT -gt 0 ]; then git status git cherry-pick --abort git reset --hard fi fi done
git tag -f previous core/production
git push origin private-production:production
